ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The practical training of the undergraduate student S.K. (School of Biology, Aristotle University of Thessaloniki, Greece) in the Hellenic Centre of Marine Research was conducted in the frame of the Operational Programme ‘Human resources development, Education and Lifelong training’ which was co-funded by the European Social Fund and by national resources through the National Strategic Reference Framework 2014-2020 (NSRF 2014-2020).
